data.comment: Today's referee, Silviu Petrescu, has blown to start the match.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Attention is being given to Columbusâ€™s Aboubacar Keita and play has been suspended briefly.
Columbus's Aboubacar Keita looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
Julian Gressel (DC United) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to DC United.
In the minute 6, Sebastian Berhalter is booked for the away team.
In Washington, D.C. DC United attack through Gelmin Rivas. The finish is off target, however.
Silviu Petrescu awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to DC United.
DC United's Gelmin Rivas attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 12, Columbus have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
DC United needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Joseph Mora for DC United has been booked by Silviu Petrescu and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 15, Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Washington, D.C. To check on Julian Gressel, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, Frederic Brillant (DC United) has received a yellow card from Silviu Petrescu.
DC United's Julian Gressel is back in action after a slight knock.
Columbus to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 22, Columbus have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Columbus in the half of DC United.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
In the minute 28, Free kick Columbus.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus.
Throw-in for DC United in the half of Columbus.
In the minute 30, Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for DC United in Washington, D.C..
Goal! Julian Gressel gives DC United a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 32, Yamil Asad instrumental with a fine assist.
Columbus drive upfield and Youness Mokhtar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a DC United defender.
In the minute 34, Free kick for DC United in their own half.
DC United's Julian Gressel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Columbus at Audi Field.
In the minute 38, DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
Silviu Petrescu signals a throw-in for DC United, close to Columbus's area.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Throw-in DC United.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 42, DC United have a goal kick.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Columbus have a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Washington, D.C..
Silviu Petrescu signals a Columbus throw-in in DC United's half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Washington, D.C..
Silviu Petrescu has blown to start the second-half.
Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
In Washington, D.C., Julian Gressel of DC United is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Corner awarded to DC United.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to DC United.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Throw-in DC United.
In the minute 53, DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus just outside DC United's area.
Pedro Santos (Columbus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Caleb Porter is making the team's first substitution at Audi Field with Lucas Zelarrayan replacing Youness Mokhtar.
Darlington Nagbe is on a sub for Sebastian Berhalter for Columbus.
In the minute 58, DC United have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus at Audi Field.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Joseph Mora.
In the minute 62, DC United make their first substitution with Erik Sorga replacing Joseph Mora.
Silviu Petrescu awards DC United a goal kick.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of DC United.
In the minute 65, At Audi Field, Erik Sorga has been yellow-carded for the home team.
DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 67, Columbus needs to be cautious. DC United have an attacking throw-in.
Can DC United capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Columbus's half?
Silviu Petrescu signals a DC United throw-in in Columbus's half.
In the minute 68, Free kick DC United.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match at Audi Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fatai Alashe, who is down injured.
In the minute 71, In Washington, D.C. Columbus's Luis Diaz is caught offside.
At Audi Field, Columbus are penalized for being offside.
Columbus to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 71, Fatai Alashe for Columbus is back on the field again.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Columbus attack but Krisztian Nemeth's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Ola Kamara is replacing Gelmin Rivas for DC United at Audi Field.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Oniel Fisher (DC United) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of DC United.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
The away team replace Fatai Alashe with Emmanuel Boateng.
Free kick Columbus.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, The home team have replaced Yamil Asad with Moses Nyeman. This is the third substitution made today by Chad Ashton.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 82, Silviu Petrescu signals a Columbus throw-in in DC United's half.
Throw-in DC United.
Caleb Porter (Columbus) is making a fourth substitution, with Jordan Hamilton replacing Waylon Francis.
In the minute 84, Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
DC United are pushing forward but Erik Sorga's finish is wide of the goal.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 88, Silviu Petrescu awards Columbus a goal kick.
Emmanuel Boateng (Columbus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Columbus to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for DC United in the half of Columbus.
Throw-in for Columbus at Audi Field.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to DC United.
Throw-in for DC United close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of DC United.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Columbus's Chris Cadden has been booked in Washington, D.C..
